Task to influencers

Write brief for influencers.

  • Specify the task of influencers. For example: test the service, try the product, visit the event and make a post
  • you can ask influencers to tag some friends in publication, take a photo in a certain style or write you a message to describe the future post
  • If necessary, add a link or hashtag to the fields below
